slides.title: Tkinter Application Developer
slides.desc: Simplifying Tkinter-based application development for inexperienced coders.

slides.title: Relational Database Model
slides.desc: Simulation of a large-scale relational database and analyzing SQL relational commands for user queries.

slides.title: Dijkstra's Path Finder
slides.desc: Optimizes and finds the shortest path of directions from one point to another on large-scale maps, using Dijkstra's algorithm.

slides.title: Logistic Regression Trainer
slides.desc: Training logistic regression with stochastic gradient descent, visualizing training accuracy based on learning rates and iterations.
